sections.title: Dark Delver (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Dark Delver class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Bardic Knowledge (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Grants knowledge checks using Intelligence modifier and class level, identical to the bard ability and stacking with other bardic knowledge sources.

sections.title: Master Explorer (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Adds half class level to Disable Device and Perception checks, allows taking 10 on Disable Device and Stealth when distracted, and reduces trap disabling time while enabling magical trap disarmament.

sections.title: Surefooted (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Allows movement through difficult terrain at normal speed, though magically manipulated ground still impedes movement normally.

sections.title: Trap Sense (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Functions as rogue trap sense but gained at 2nd level and increases every 3 levels, stacking with other sources of trap sense.

sections.title: Thrilling Escape (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Allows delaying a triggered trap's activation until end of next turn by making an immediate action Disable Device check, usable 1-3 times per day based on level.

sections.title: Guardbreaker (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Treats trap sense bonus as favored enemy bonus against constructs, oozes, and undead, stacking with actual favored enemy bonuses.

sections.title: Resourceful Disabler (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Allows using Disable Device skill without tools at no penalty.

sections.title: Vigilant Combatant (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Adds half class level as a bonus to initiative checks.

sections.title: Left for Dead (Su) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Once per day, when killed by an attack or failed save, instead becomes unconscious at -1 hp but stable, appearing dead for 1 minute before awakening.

sections.title: Fortunate Soul (Su) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Allows rerolling a saving throw once per day (twice at 10th level), must take the second result even if worse.

sections.title: True Seeing (Sp) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Grants the ability to use true seeing spell once per day with caster level equal to class level.

sections.title: Nick of Time (Ex) (Dark Delver)
sections.description: Once per day, can use an immediate action to perform an action that normally requires a standard action.
